data.description: Provides a generic TAG15 for SWIFT
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The TAG15 is a part of many different SWIFT messages.

    This module belongs under the SWIFT::Factory tree.

    I propose to add an additional level to the name of the 'Tag' class
    modules.

    Thereby I propose SWIFT::Factory::Tag::Tag15
